items.title: What we know about fatal Lisbon funicular derailment
items.description: At least 15 people have been killed and 20 more injured after a carriage on the Gloria funicular derailed and crashed.

items.title: At least 15 dead after Lisbon's historic funicular derails
items.description: Lisbon's mayor says the capital is in mourning, adding it was a "tragic moment for the city".

items.title: Putin says Russia will achieve all aims militarily if Ukraine does not agree deal
items.description: The Russian leader has rejected calls for a ceasefire as his troops advance.

items.title: Epstein accusers say they are compiling list of his associates
items.description: Victims of the disgraced financier give emotional accounts of abuse in a news conference on the steps of the US Capitol.

items.title: Israel intensifies Gaza City attacks as UN warns of 'horrific' consequences for displaced families
items.description: Strikes reportedly kill 31 people in the city, home to a million people and where a famine was declared last month.
